cards.rules_text:
Players can't cast spells with the same name as cards exiled with Kaya.
[+1]: Target player exiles a card from their hand. You gain life equal to its mana value.
[0]: Each player exiles the top card of their library. They may pay life equal to its mana value to put it into their hand.
[-2]: Target player exiles a creature they control.
cards.special_text:
Players can't cast spells with the same name as cards exiled with Kaya.
[+1]: Target player exiles a card from their hand. You gain life equal to its mana value.
[0]: Each player exiles the top card of their library. They may pay life equal to its mana value to put it into their hand.
[-2]: Target player exiles a creature they control.

!tag Ravnica
cycle Guildmaster
!tag Orzhov
